text: My heart shall cry out for Moab; his fugitives shall flee unto Zoar, an heifer of three years old: for by the mounting up of Luhith with weeping shall they go it up; for in the way of Horonaim they shall raise up a cry of destruction.15.5 hisâ€¦: or, to the borders thereof, even to Zoar, as an heifer15.5 destruction: Heb. breaking
